attributes.action: Consider recommending Simon Weston for a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sure that he would hate the fuss, but nobody I know deserves the honour more than he does. His courage and dignity are amazing, considering what he has been through. He is an example to every one of us.
His recent broadcasts on the 25th anniversary of the Falkland's war, were so very moving.
What a guy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
